Frequently asked questions

Only one of my subscriptions is showing up in my account
If you've bought more than one subscription and only one is showing up in your account, it may be you bought them using different e-mail address or delivery details. Please contact customer services directly who will be happy to help you.
Can I speak to Customer Services directly?

You can reach customer support by:

Email: help@mymagazine.co.uk

Telephone: 0330 3331 122 (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm)

Online: www.mymagazine.co.uk/HelpSubscription

US Titles/Numbers

Bass Player: 1-800-234-1831

Guitar Player: 1-800-289-9839

Guitar World: 1-800-456-6441

Mac|Life: 1-844-779-2822

Maximum PC: 1-844-779-2822

PC Gamer US: 1-844-779-2822

Call us toll-free from 8:30am to 5pm (Mon-Fri, EST)

I can’t login. Who can help me?

Unfortunately, it can take up to 48 hours for a new subscription to be set up. If you ordered more than 48 hours ago and you are still having trouble logging in, please contact us by:

Email: help@mymagazine.co.uk

Telephone: 0330 3331 122 (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm)

Online: www.mymagazine.co.uk/HelpSubscription

US Titles/Numbers

Bass Player: 1-800-234-1831

Guitar Player: 1-800-289-9839

Guitar World: 1-800-456-6441

Mac|Life: 1-844-779-2822

Maximum PC: 1-844-779-2822

PC Gamer US: 1-844-779-2822

Call us toll-free from 8am to 7pm (Mon-Fri, EDT) and 10am to 2pm (Sat, EDT)
